Bafia: Mɛ̀ Ǹsɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn, mɛ̀ yɛɛ kani Kirya, giɓ anɛ Bɛ̀ll à ɓɔ̀ngà, rì ɓɔn ɓii ɓɛ ǹkeesii lɛ kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀; nni àa mɛ̀ cɛ̀ncɛm yɛɛ keesii mìni, lɔŋ ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛ yii saaɗ ɓɛ keesii girig mìni;
lɛ saaɗ ànɛ à rì ɓi ɓìsi, ànɛ à ki rì ɓiì kɔ̀rii a lɔ̀ŋkis fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀.
Geesɛ̀n ɗì rìcenɛ̀n rì fyòoog ɓyɛɛ ɓa rì ɓìsi lɛ rìfa ɗi Bɛ̀ll Seŋi, rì ɗi Yeesus Kiris Man à Seŋi, ɓi saaɗ rì ɓi nkɔ̀nɛ̀n.
Mɛ̀ɛ ǹnyààrɛɛ lɛɛ̀gwey yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀ɛ nghɛɛ lɛ ɓɔn ɓɔɔ ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛɛ̀ ghɛghɛɓ ɓi saaɗ lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ Tààta à siŋdɛ̀ngà ɓìsi.
Nni ɓigomìnɛ, Iyà, com ki ǹtɔtɔ̀g ki yin lɛ kìdɔ̀gsɛna ki nyɔn kɛɛ̀ki ǹfaa wɔ̀, ki ri lɔŋ kidɔ̀gsɛna ki tì tekà à tumɛ̀n a rìtumɛ̀n, kɛɛ ri lɛ ti kɔ̀nɛɛna ɓìsi rì ɓìsi.
Nni ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n à rì lɛ mum a ghɛɓ yɛ̀ɛ ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓi Bɛ̀ll ɓyɛɛ̀ kpaakpàà; kìdɔ̀gsɛna ki ɓì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì nɔ̀ɔ̀tii kɛɛ̀ kìn lɔɔ, lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ɓì wokà a rìtumɛ̀n.
Lɛ ɓɛ̀yègsì-ɓum ɓɛ mɛ sààtɛn ɓi ziinɛ lɛɛ̀gwey; ɓɛ gherɛɛ ɓi lɛ, Yeesus Kiris à yalɛ̀ngà lɔŋ mum. Rìkuu ɗi mum ɗìn ɗi ri ǹ-yègsì-ɓum ɗi ki ɓa ŋwaànɛ a ɗùùɗuu ri Kiris.
Ɓì konàg rì mìniìɓɔmiɗ lɛ kɛ̀ ɓi ɗimzi ɓiɗùn ɓi ɓi kìsay kis, wɔ̀lɛ ɓì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ lɔŋ ki terì mɛ̀lèɓ mɛ miì mɛ̀cèm.
Mum ǹcèm ànɛ à ghaghii ɓìdyànì, kɛ̀ɛ ɓèŋdi rirèsì ɗi Kiris, à yin ɗi Bɛ̀ll; nni mum ǹcèm ànɛ à ɓiì kɛ̀ɛ asu à ɓèŋɓèŋ rìrèsì ɗi Kiris, à rì lɛ, nyi rì Seŋi, nyi rì Man.
Nni i mum à yùu yì a lɔ̀ŋkin, kɛ̀ɛ ɓay ɗì rìrèsì ɗiǹ, kɛ̀ ɓi ghàɓ nyi ɓi naa yìn, kɛ̀ ɓi ki tògsi nyi;
ɓisuulɛ ŋwaànɛ à tògsii nyi, à teri gàɓ ɓi ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓii ɓi mɛkìkìì.

Nsoò yɛ̀ɛ ǹtèghɛɛ ɓìɓan ɓi lɛ, nkaǹ mìni, ǹghɛɛ kìrɔɔ lɛ, kɛ̀ɛ nkàǹ mini ɓyɔ rì kìkànì ɓi rìfɛɓ, wɔ̀lɛ ǹɗì rì rìyitì ɗi lɛ mɛ̀ɛmiɗ ǹɗì lɛ n-yù a lɔ̀ŋkin, nkpaà mìni ɓyɔ rì ŋwɔm fɔɔnnɛ kìnyàà kis ki roǹ ki sosòɓ.
Ɓɔn ɓɛ goni à giɓ anɛ à rì girig m̀ɓɔ̀nɛn, ɓɛ togsaghiì wɔ̀.
